mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "From the Floor", "Square Dance Date Book", "As I See It", "Let's Double the Dancers", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "Good Square Dance Manners Can Be Taught", "Viewpoint - The One-Night Stand", "Busy Round Dance Teacher Garners New Honor", "Style Series: Ladies Chain Thru the Star", "Reminiscences of Square Dancing and its Music", "Round the Outside Ring", "Sets in Order Workshop", "Caller of the Month - Van and Dottie Van der Walker", "Paging the Roundancers - Gus and Sally Pipkin", "On the Record and Record Report", and "Experimental Lab - Square Chain Thru".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
